'''''Internal Combustion Charge''''' is a [[Daily Commission]] in [[Natlan]].

==Steps==
{{Quest Description|Collect particles within the time limit.}}
# Collect all Pyro particles within the time limit (0/25)
#* Objective: Reach the target location within 120 seconds

==Gameplay Notes==
* For the Tequemecan Valley location north of the [[Ancient Watchtower]] Domain with a Yumkasaurus Spiritsconce provided and a goal of 36 Pyro particles:
** Collect the first group of particles shown by the camera, then use the [[Coilgrass Sigil]]s to reach the top of the large tree nearby. After reaching the top, head east to continue the challenge.
